name: mapError
signature: { <E, E2>(f: (e: E) => E2): <A>(self: Exit<A, E>) => Exit<A, E2>; <A, E, E2>(self: Exit<A, E>, f: (e: E) => E2): Exit<A, E2>; }
description:
Maps over the error contained in the `Failure` of the specified exit using
the provided function.
documentation:
Maps over the error contained in the `Failure` of the specified exit using
the provided function.
